MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN setword END) keywordsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN cansetword END) keywordNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN setword END) monsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN cansetword END) monitortimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN setword END) warnsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN cansetword END) warntimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN setword END) sreportsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN cansetword END) subjectReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN setword END) cloudsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN cansetword MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='大屏开通' THEN status END) totalid FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid ) t inner join bs_user user on t.userid=`user`.id where t.userid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.subjecttimes - t.subsetword subsetword,t.persontimes - t.personsetword personsetword,t.keywordNum - t.keywordsetword keywordsetword,t.monitortimes - t.monsetword monsetword, t.warntimes - t.warnsetword warnsetword,t.subjectReport - t.sreportsetword sreportsetword,t.cloudtimes - t.cloudsetword cloudsetword,t.modalNum - t.smodalNum smodalNum, t.authority -t.status authority from ( SELECT userid, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN setword END) subsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN cansetword END) subjecttimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN setword END) personsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN cansetword END) persontimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN setword END) keywordsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN cansetword END) keywordNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN setword END) monsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN cansetword END) monitortimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN setword END) warnsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN cansetword END) warntimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN setword END) sreportsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN cansetword END) subjectReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN setword END) cloudsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN cansetword END) cloudtimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN setword END) smodalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN cansetword END) modalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='重点关注个数' THEN setword END) status, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='重点关注个数' THEN cansetword END) authority FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid ) t inner join bs_user user on t.userid=`user`.id where t.userid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select user.id,user.typecode,user.managerid,user.usertype,user.expirydate expir, user.agent,user.name,user.telephone,user.mobilephone,user.email,user.ownindustry, user.orgname,user.usertype,user.accounttype, user.idcard, user.address,user.companyfullname,user.companyshortname, user.province, user.city,user.companycode, user.operateruser,user.status,user.password, t.subjecttimes,t.persontimes,t.keywordNum,t.monitortimes,t.warntimes,t.subjectReport,t.cloudtimes,t.dayReport,weekReport,monthReport, t.modalNum,user.expirydate expirdate,t.setTrade,t.childtimes,t.microopen,t.setReport,t.isupdate,t.authority from ( SELECT userid, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN setword END) subsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN cansetword END) subjecttimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN setword END) personsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN cansetword END) persontimes,

MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN setword END) cloudsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN cansetword END) cloudtimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='日报开通' THEN status END) dayReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='周报开通' THEN status END) weekReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='月报开通' THEN status END) monthReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN cansetword END) modalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='有效期限' THEN cansetword END) expirdate, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='交易开通' THEN status END) setTrade, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='子账号个数' THEN cansetword END) childtimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='微监测开通' THEN status END) microopen, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人工报告开通' THEN status END) setReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='操作开通' THEN isupdate END) isupdate, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='重点关注个数' THEN setword END) status, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='重点关注个数' THEN cansetword END) authority FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid ) t inner join bs_user user on t.userid=`user`.id where t.userid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select pu.id id,pu.orgname orgname from bs_user as pu left join bs_user as su on pu.id = su.parentid where su.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from bs_user

select
from bs_user where password = #{password,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and (name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or mobilephone = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} or email = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR})

update bs_user
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownindustry = #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accounttype = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prices = #{prices,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_member = #{familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileaddress = #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyfullname = #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyshortname = #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateruser = #{operateruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
maxLanMuNumber = #{maxlanmunumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maxKeyWordNumber = #{maxkeywordnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beizhu = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority = #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subjecttimes = #{subjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
microopen = #{microopen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitortimes = #{monitortimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warntimes = #{warntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
persontimes = #{persontimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cloudtimes = #{cloudtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
childtimes = #{childtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usertimes = #{usertimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where 1=1
and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update bs_user set registertime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expirydate = #{expirydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bs_user where name=#{name} and password=#{password}

select
from bs_user where name=#{name}

select * from bs_user where 1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
and mobilephone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mobilephone}), '%')
and orgname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgname}), '%')
and usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by registertime desc

SELECT
FROM BS_USER WHERE PARENTID IS NULL
